nodes.text: Tasjon was a city on the planet of Corulag that hosted an important annual swoop race in the years before the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, this race was won by Ignar Ominaz and the city was the origin of a HoloNet News article that broadcast his victory.

Tasjon was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 54, published in-universe on the thirteenth day of the fifth month in 22 BBY. The article that referenced the city, titled "Ominaz Keeps Top Ranking," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
